definition: background/bottom/base/end (of the month, year etc)/remnants/(math.) radix/base
to count/to count as/to regard as/to enumerate (sb's shortcomings)

sentences.english: Numbers other than integers can be represented in various bases.
sentences.chinese: 可以以的形式輸入任意底數的一個數字。

sentences.english: Be sex of a probability certainly, the truth of a matter must be gotten big, probability ability is significant.
sentences.chinese: 一定是一個概率性的，底數必須得大，概率纔有意義。

sentences.english: A logarithm tells you what power a base number must be raised to in order to produce a given value.
sentences.chinese: 對數說明一個底數的幾次冪等於一個給定的值。

sentences.english: We got a clear picture of total government debt in the whole country through auditing.
sentences.chinese: 通過審計，摸清全國政府性債務底數。
